TopicTitle: Is there a way to hide the kerbal in IVA?

Articles.Content:
I'd really like to know because i dont like having it in the way.

I just really need to hide the kerbal's body in the IVA mode!

I cant figure out how though

If you mean the portaits on the lower right of the screen, there are arrow keys beside the left most portrait that allow you to remove  or add the number of kerbals seen, You can completely remove them from view if you wish.
